name: 3D Illustration Kit (Freebie)
description:
👇Download👇

Family Bundle


63 full-color illustrations that allow you to tell any story. The nicest family and their friends are here. Build stories and scenes with different characters and poses. Use them to draw attention and give personality to your presentation, website, or app design.


What is included? 📦


— 63 premium 3D illustrations + PNG files + Scenes of different characters - which you can use in any project, such as app design, web projects, Figma drafts.

It contains:


• 10 scenes PNG files (transparent)


• 63 characters and variations PNG


• Full expresive characters design


• Figma project file
